items.title: Yep, not worthy...
items.content_html:
Changing it up and will be doing some blogs with 30 day challenges. I will post a few times a month but not everyday. I know I said for the New Years Resolution that I'd post everyday but it took a week to realize that good quality wasn't being published. 

Once I figure out the first 30 Day Challenge Project, I will post. For now.. TBC (To Be Continued).

items.title: Tomorrow's Post Will Be Worthy
items.content_html:
Future Posts:

I have decided to write about the stages of New Years Resolution and starting some 30 challenge activies. We shall see what happens next. 
Stay Tuned.

Mood: Tired

Weather: STILL COLD High 11/Low-9

Goal for the Day: To Post

Quote of the Day:

items.title: Day 5 Post... Not really inspiring...
items.content_html:
Mood: Content

Weather: COLD!!! High 14/Low -3 and WINDY AS HELL

Goal for the Day: Rest..Feeling a cold knocking on my window or maybe that's the wind from the "Bomb Cyclone" we experienced over the last 24 hours. 

Quote of the day from a good friend (You know who you are): We know the right words are oxygen, that dead English polluted our minds every day. Those combinations of words don’t last forever, but ugly words and phrases linger in the vocabulary. They’re picked up and passed on like a virus by the unwary and by the pretentious who like to give the “appearance of solidity to pure wind.(Orwell)” - Harold Evans

items.title: Quote of the Day
items.content_html:
Mood: Blah

Weather: COLD!!! High 28/Low 8

Goal for the Day: Shoveling Snow 

Quote of the Day:

items.title: Quote of the Day
items.content_html: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment. Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship. What we think, we become. Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.

items.title: Day Three Starts at Midnight...
items.content_html:
I may forget to post this evening so if I do I will post first thing this morning. CAB, right?

Mood: Optimistic

Weather: COLD!!! High 27/Low 11

Goal for the Day:  Celebrate my personal holiday

Quote of the Day:

items.title: Second Day of The New Years Resolution
items.content_html:
The feel of today was weird. Nothing too out of the ordinary. Feeling uneasy. Maybe due to the storm but the pit of my stomach is feeling icky...

I had prewrote a post yesterday for today.  For those who know me have heard this conversation before... or you've had this conversation with me.

If you are going to remember one thing, everyone is the star of their own movie.  You're just a guest appearance in their story. If you look at that in the sense that everyone is a little self involved and that sometimes their reactions to something is reflection on their previous scenes you'll be alright interacting with those around you. I am trying to remember that I calm down my own inner dialog.

Advice I am trying to give myself... Take everyday with a grain of salt. Try to think of one thing a day that makes you feel grateful and can make me smile. The more you can smile, the better your outlook on life, and the better your life will be. 

Mood: Feeling Anxious... Not sure why but feeling like something is about to happen. Hopefully, it's not too bad. Maybe it's weather related... 

Weather: COLD!!! High 18/Low this morning -13

Goal for the Day:  Help someone. Make someone smile. 

Quote of the Day:

items.title: Happy National Hangover Day!!!
items.content_html:
January 1st, National Hangover Day. It was just that.. After a full day of recovery, I decided to venture out into the frigid winter cold. So I drove, with my hands frozen to the steering wheel to the local grocery. Everyone was dressed like me; wearing sweats, giant coats, and NO MAKEUP! We all looked like we had too much fun the night before and were just looking for the cure for 2017, haha.

Mood: Sleepy but hopeful was my first post... until the page froze and I lost everything I had written. So now a little pissed, dehydrated, and a little bit hopeful!

Weather: COLD!!! High of 12, Low of -1.

Goal for the Day: Sleep more, eat good food, and prepare for the work week.

Quote of the Day:

items.title: New Year, New You?
items.content_html:
It seems like Americans, on social media, are more pessimistic than usual this year. "New Year, New You...YEAH RIGHT!" More than worrying about something to resolve, we should really try to adjust our attitude towards adjusting to change. People fear change because they don't like feeling uncomfortable. This year is going to be a year of adjustments and reflection. 

The goal for this broad is going to post at least once a day, everyday, for an entire year. This will give some reflection for the 2018 year and give me, and maybe you, a chance to reflect change. Even if we don't like it, outside influences are constantly changing our perspective and personality. It's how we adjust to those changes that will reflect our character.
